name: LoungeflyBeauty and the Beast: Princess Scènes Crossbody Tas - Mercroid Nederland
description: Hallo daar,  Disney liefhebbers! Hebben jullie met spanning gewacht op jouw  kans om getuige te zijn van het betoverende verhaal van Belle, dat zich voor je neus ontvouwt x20;heel ogen? Maak je klaar om op de eerste rij te gaan zitten met de Loungefly Disney Beauty and the Beast Belle Princess Scenes Crossbody Bag. Trust us, you won't want to miss a single moment of this epic story.Featuring stunning, original in-house art, each side of this bag is a masterpiece in itself. The scenes from Beauty and the Beast are depicted in such breathtaking detail that you'll feel like you're actually a part of the story. You'll especially love the show-stopping finale where Lumiere takes center stage and the chandelier dazzles as a spotlight. The dishes line up, the champagne corks pop, and the vegan leather (polyurethane) rose clasp at the top completes the spectacle. We could go on and on, but we'll let you discover the rest on your own.Now, let's talk about the side panels. On one side, Gaston shows off his impressive antler-hanging skills in the tavern (seriously, what can't that guy do?). On the other side, Belle and the Beast share a cozy dance in the ballroom, and we challenge you not to swoon over their heart-melting chemistry. And if that wasn't enough, the back panel features a lovely wintery landscape where the Beast holds a tiny bird and Belle welcomes in more winged creatures. It's like having a piece of the enchanting world of Disney with you wherever you go.But wait, there's more! This crossbody bag is not only breathtakingly beautiful, but it's also practical and convenient. The shiny gold-colored metal hardware and vegan leather (polyurethane) material make for a durable and stylish accessory that's adjustable and comfortable to wear with its removable straps. And for those who appreciate the finer details, we've even included coordinating lining that will bring a smile to your face every time you open your bag.So get ready to turn your everyday travels into enchanting adventures with the LoungeflyDisney Belle en het Beest Belle Prinses Scènes Crossbody Tas. Geloof ons, dit is een accessoire waarmee je je een echte Disneyprinses voelt. Hier zijn enkele punten om het allemaal samen te vatten: - Originele kunst van het huis met scènes uit Belle en het Beest aan alle kanten - Glanzend goudkleurig metalen hardware en veganistisch leer (polyurethaan) materiaal- Verstelbare en afneembare bandjes voor comfort en gemak- Bijpassende voering voor een extra vleugje Disney-magie- Afmetingen: 11.5” Bx 9.5” H x 3.5 inch D (Let op: de breedte wordt gemeten over het midden van de tas.) - Officieel gelicentieerd Disney-productProductdetailsProducttype: CrossbodytasLicentie: Beauty and the BeastFabrikant:LoungeflySpecificaties Gewicht: Ongeveer 750 gram (26 ounces) Land van herkomst: China Materialen: Kunstleer (polyurethaan) SKU: WDTB2615GTIN: 671803426306
